[@microsoft/fast-foundation](./fast-foundation.md) &gt; [DesignSystemProvider](./fast-foundation.designsystemprovider.md) &gt; [unregisterCSSCustomProperty](./fast-foundation.designsystemprovider.unregistercsscustomproperty.md)

## DesignSystemProvider.unregisterCSSCustomProperty() method

Unregister a CSSCustomPropertyDefinition. If all registrations of the definition are unregistered, the CSS custom property will be removed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unregisterCSSCustomProperty(behavior: CSSCustomPropertyDefinition): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  behavior | [CSSCustomPropertyDefinition](./fast-foundation.csscustompropertydefinition.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
